compounddef.title: SAI - BFD specific public APIs and data structures

detaileddescription.para: Full Offload: both session establishment and sustenance

briefdescription.para: SAI offload type of BFD session.
IP in IP Encapsulation | L2 Ethernet header | IP header | Inner IP header | Original BFD packet.
L3 GRE Tunnel Encapsulation | L2 Ethernet header | IP header | GRE header | Original BFD packet.
SAI type of encapsulation for BFD.

detaileddescription.para: BFD Session is in Admin down

briefdescription.para: To enable echo function on BFD session.
Minimum Remote Transmit interval in microseconds.
Minimum Remote Receive interval in microseconds.
Local Diagnostic code field as specified by RFC.
BFD Session counter IDs in sai_get_bfd_session_stats() call.
SAI offload type of BFD session.
SAI type of encapsulation for BFD.
Defines the operational status of the BFD session.
BFD Session counter IDs in sai_get_bfd_session_stats() call.

memberdef.definition: typedef sai_status_t(* sai_create_bfd_session_fn) (_Out_ sai_object_id_t *bfd_session_id, _In_ sai_object_id_t switch_id, _In_ uint32_t attr_count, _In_ const sai_attribute_t *attr_list)
memberdef.argsstring: )(_Out_ sai_object_id_t *bfd_session_id, _In_ sai_object_id_t switch_id, _In_ uint32_t attr_count, _In_ const sai_attribute_t *attr_list)
memberdef.name: sai_create_bfd_session_fn

simplesect.para: SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS if operation is successful otherwise a different error code is returned.
SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS if operation is successful otherwise a different error code is returned.

memberdef.definition: typedef sai_status_t(* sai_get_bfd_session_stats_fn) (_In_ sai_object_id_t bfd_session_id, _In_ uint32_t number_of_counters, _In_ const sai_stat_id_t *counter_ids, _Out_ uint64_t *counters)
memberdef.argsstring: )(_In_ sai_object_id_t bfd_session_id, _In_ uint32_t number_of_counters, _In_ const sai_stat_id_t *counter_ids, _Out_ uint64_t *counters)
memberdef.name: sai_get_bfd_session_stats_fn

briefdescription.para: Get BFD session statistics counters. Deprecated for backward compatibility.

parameterdescription.para: Number of counters in the array
Specifies the array of counter ids

simplesect.para: SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS on success, failure status code on error

parameterdescription.para: Number of counters in the array
Specifies the array of counter ids
